effect.Name: Darker Color
effect.description: Darker Color - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Compares the total of all channel values for the blend and base color and displays the lower value color. Darker Color does not produce a third color, which can result from the Darken blend, because it chooses the lowest channel values from both the base and the blend color to create the result color
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Darker Color (Background) Shader | 1.0 (22.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Compares the total of all channel values for the blend and base color and displays the lower value color. Darker Color does not produce a third color, which can result from the Darken blend, because it chooses the lowest channel values from both the base and the blend color to create the result color

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
